articles.title: Early US intelligence report suggests US strikes only set back Iran's nuclear program by months
articles.description: An early US intelligence report indicates that recent US strikes against Iran have only delayed Iran's nuclear program by a few months.

articles.title: Chef Vijay Kumar, from Tamil Nadu, has won the prestigious James Beard Award.
articles.description: Chef Vijay Kumar, the Executive chef of Semma, a Michelin-starred South Indian restaurant in NYC, has won the James Beard Award.

articles.title: Details of US strikes on Iran revealed as Hegseth attacks media and avoids giving clear uranium answer.
articles.description: Details of the US strikes on Iran have been revealed, while Hegseth has attacked the media and avoided giving a clear answer regarding uranium.
